Articles.Content:
I made a lander called the Turkey something (I usually number them by the number of attempts), which is the cutest thing you've ever seen in KSP. Ever. Here are some pictures:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Strap some cat ears on it to appeal to self proclaimed "otakus" too.

I don't know what to put here but SQUEEEEE!!!!

DOWNLOAD

Mods:

Kethane

I'll upload a version without the kethane scanner later

No landing..?

Sorry, I forgot to take more pictures, but I assure you it can land and go back into orbit. I forgot to put batteries on it so you'll need to deactivate torque and use RCS for turning. there's plenty though.
